name: Automated-cage-system
tagline: A hardware based project using arduino uno, motors, pumps etc. to make automated cage base system for bird type pet animals.
body:
### Automated Cage System for Bird type Companion Animal

This is a hardware based system for looking after the pet animals automatically in the absence of their owner.

***
![GIF_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30968787/87826835-66e52200-c89b-11ea-9de2-c402f99c6f47.gif)

Automatic Control of Environmental Parameters. 

***

![GIF_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30968787/87826841-6ba9d600-c89b-11ea-93dc-ea8067e5b81c.gif)

 Automated Egg Count and Collection.

***

![GIF_3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30968787/87826854-706e8a00-c89b-11ea-8cd7-179577587cdd.gif)

 Automated System for Water and Food Supply.


***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
